title: My Account got hacked
body: Hi guys my account got hacked 5/01/2015 around 2:20pm (estimated) EST. My summoner name was ukevvin1235 it got transferred to EU WEST and the password of my account got changed **PLEASE HELP RIOT I BEG YOU! **

replies.body: [You need to immediately send in a support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account#h3)
